mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_comment (post_id, user_id, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.post_id AS postId, c.user_id AS userId, c.content, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.updated_at AS updatedAt, u.user_nickname AS userName FROM tb_comment c JOIN tb_user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.created_at ASC
SELECT comment_id AS commentId, post_id AS postId, user_id AS userId, content, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM tb_comment WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_comment SET content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
